trans_title: 青年企业家 第三季
introduction: Lord Sugar’s young candidates will make the leap from classroom to boardroom and face an education like no other as they embark on a series of tough tasks, pushing their skills to the limit. The young candidates will face the same cut-throat competition as in the adult series - it’s survival of the fittest as the tasks become more challenging.From all corners of the UK, each of the aspiring moguls have been selected for their academic flair and burning passion for business - Lord Sugar has spotted something in all of them, but only one can succeed in becoming the next Young Apprentice.
chinese_title: 青年企业家 第三季
